column2: The  contributions  of  the  Airmen  /  Airwomen  have  been  increased  in  September
2019 from Rs. 1750 to sums ranging from Rs. 2750 to Rs. 3250, depending on the
The  payments  due  to  the  Petitioners  who  have  completed  36  months  prior  to
retirement  have  been  increased  upto  Rs.  700,000  while  those  with  less  than  36
months are to be paid Rs. 600,000;
Airmen retiring after September 2019 are entitled to a sum of Rs. 700,000.
